steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on hyperlink_releases --> navigate to Page_releases
step 5: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_requirements --> navigate to Page_requirements
step 6: At Page_requirements click on hyperlink_test_reports_test_design_traceability_re --> navigate to Page_test-reports_test-design_traceability-report
